meanings.definition: Looking back on or dealing with past events or situations.
meanings.sent1: The retrospective analysis of the old photographs brought back memories of the past.
meanings.sent2: She took a retrospective approach to understanding her childhood experiences.
meanings.sent3: The retrospective examination of his messy room made him realize he needed to clean up.
meanings.sent4: Her retrospective view of the family vacation was filled with nostalgia and laughter.
meanings.sent5: The retrospective painting captured the essence of a bygone era with vivid colors and details.

meanings.definition: In a way that relates to or involves looking back on past events or situations.
meanings.sent1: He retrospectively analyzed his mistakes to learn from them and improve.
meanings.sent2: The team decided to review the project retrospectively to identify areas for enhancement.
meanings.sent3: Retrospectively, she realized she should have taken a different route to avoid traffic.
meanings.sent4: The author wrote the book retrospectively, reflecting on his journey to success.
meanings.sent5: Retrospectively, the decision to invest in the stock market seemed risky but turned out profitable.
